title: Truth Gaming LF Jungler
body:
Truth gaming is looking for a jungler that has experience in shot-calling aswel as decent champion pools (No OTP's), must be willing to adapt to the meta aswel being open minded

The requirements:

*Plat 5 + 

*Working Mic

*Flexible timezone (Pref 6pm-11pm) weekdays

If you are interested and want to be apart of a 5v5 competitive atmosphere feel free to add me "Shiney"

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body: check my profile, oralbtoothpaste, lemme know if u want me
